title: Possible client bug?
body: I would like to know if there was a way to get back the 13lp I just lost, I accepted two ques in a row and the client just sat with the timer expired and saying I had accepted the que, then it reloads and I had a dodge timer, Now I am sitting here with a 30 min que restriction because the client did not load the champ select.

replies.body:
We can't directly alter LP without upsetting the integrity of the ranked system, but in the future, if you see this happen try not to Q for ranked knowing that this connection issue could be happening again. Always try troubleshooting in a custom or practice game first.

Update a couple of your network settings, specifically Port Forwarding and your DNS settings. Make sure you check those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the ports to open and how you should configure your DNS.

We aren't able to adjust ranked stats, it could literally break the system.  :(  What happened to you sucks, though, and I'd like to help.  It sounds like you're losing sync in champion select so you can't transition over to the game server.  Your best bet would be to stick to custom games for now while going over each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  I hope that helps!
